name: Polar Putt-Putt
description:
Are your hobbies golf and magnets? Do you love going out and getting birdies with the boys? Well, have we got the game for you. Induct yourself into this electrifying experience!

Made for GJL Game Parade Spring 2021 Jam!

The theme was 'Strength in Differences' so we decided to make a game where you need to use the differences in magnets to play golf.

Made by Gyliph and Sem

Art by Gyliph

Music by Sem

Everything else by both

(Shouts out to Sierra for name)
